Flower | blank2_info_sec1 = Azalea | blank3_name_sec1 = - Bird | blank3_info_sec1 = Eurasian Coot | blank4_name_sec1 = | blank4_info_sec1 = | blank5_name_sec1 = | blank5_info_sec1 = | blank6_name_sec1 = | blank6_info_sec1 = | blank7_name_sec1 = | blank7_info_sec1 = | blank_name_sec2 = Phone number | blank_info_sec2 =04-7185-1111 | blank1_name_sec2 = Address | blank1_info_sec2 = 1858 Banchi, Abiko-shi, Chiba-ken 270-1192 | website = Abiko City | footnotes = }} Abiko (我孫子市, Abiko-shi) is a city in Chiba Prefecture, Japan. It is next to the Tone River. ==Neighboring cities== * Inzai, Chiba * Kashiwa, Chiba * Toride, Ibaraki * Tone, Ibaraki ==Education== ===Universities=== * Chuo Gakuin University () * Kawamura Gakuen Women's University () ==People from Abiko== * Aoki Isao (青木 功) - Professional golfer and member of the World Golf Hall of Fame * Kiyoshi Matsumoto (松本清) - Business person, founder of the Matsumoto Kiyoshi drugstore chain, past mayor of Matsumoto, Chiba ==Other websites== * Abiko official website Category:Cities in Chiba Prefecture
